author: David McLaughlin, Julie Johnsson
title: Defense Firms to Vie for Virus Aid With Boeing Weighing Options
description: U.S. defense contractors and a huge network of their suppliers are expected to seek some of the $17 billion pool of federal money designated for companies vital to national security and contending with coronavirus disruptions.
content:
Photographer: Yichuan Cao/NurPhoto via Getty Images
